https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nZwzqhezcemWJAeMB1QCkIcaruQ.jpg Nenê has been married to Geralda for 30 years. One Sunday afternoon, as usual, he goes to a samba to meet his friends. When he comes home, he finds a surprise. His wife was taken to the hospital. Without letting the ball drop, he finds a solution to be near his beloved wife. Aquém das Nuvens
